name: Yue's Physics Playground for Oculus Quest
name_original: Yue's Physics Playground for Oculus Quest
description:
Yue's Physics Playground

  • Fully physics based hands
  • Fully physics based PID regulated Drone
  • Cube Builder with Unitiys Fixed Joint
  • Cube Builder with my handcrafted Joint
  • Paperplanes with a Paperplane-Gun
  • Airballoon-Gun
  • Simple Real Gun
  • Gravity Balls
  • Pen and Whiteboard
  • A Heavy Anvil

This is a physics and gameplay playground that will regularly updated with new features. Save yourself early access!

See development Log on Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/YueBeifong
